contentList.content: <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">Camp Supplies</LSTag> that have been manually consumed in order to Rest.
Expend consumed <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">camp supplies</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Expend [1] consumed <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">camp supplies</LSTag> to gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> for your character.
Expend [1] consumed <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">camp supplies</LSTag> to gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> for your party.
Expend [1] consumed <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">camp supplies</LSTag> to gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> for your character.
Expend [1] consumed <LSTag Tooltip="CampSupplies">camp supplies</LSTag> to gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> for your party.
